cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

project("arm_motors_int64")

# Find requirements
find_package(fastcdr REQUIRED)
find_package(fastrtps REQUIRED)

find_package(microcdr REQUIRED)
find_package(microxrcedds_client REQUIRED)

add_executable(ArmMotorsInt64
  ArmMotorsInt64_main.cpp
  ArmMotorsInt64_service.cpp
  ArmMotorsInt64.cxx
  ArmMotorsInt64PubSubTypes.cxx
  # Generated by fastddsgen, but not used for the service.
  # ArmMotorsInt64Publisher.cxx
  # ArmMotorsInt64Subscriber.cxx
  # ArmMotorsInt64PubSubMain.cxx
)
target_link_libraries(ArmMotorsInt64
  fastcdr
  fastrtps
)

add_executable(ArmMotorsInt64Micro
  ArmMotorsInt64_xrce.cpp
)
target_include_directories(ArmMotorsInt64Micro
  PRIVATE
  ${microcdr_INCLUDE_DIR}
  ${microxrcedds_client_INCLUDE_DIR}  
)
target_link_directories(ArmMotorsInt64Micro
  PRIVATE
  ${microcdr_LIB_DIR}
  ${microxrcedds_client_LIB_DIR}  
)
target_link_libraries(ArmMotorsInt64Micro
  microcdr
  microxrcedds_client
)
